sentences.sentence: Study anti-inflammation mechanism of Plantago Asiatica L in a rat model with traumatic synovitis.
sentences.translation: 研究车前草在创伤性滑膜炎大鼠模型中的抗炎机制。

sentences.sentence: Little work has been reported on the tissue culture of Plantago major l.
sentences.translation: 大车前的组织培养工作，目前报道很少。

sentences.sentence: Objective:to study anti-inflammation mechanism of Plantago asiatica L in rat model with traumatic synovitis.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究中药车前子对小鼠滑膜炎的抗炎机制。
